__e: You're not rushing about frantically trying to find her.
When I ask you a glass of water, you're not so brave!
Why don't you walk ahead of me so I can see what kind of junk you got in your trunk?
Why don't you head back, tell everyone what's happening?
If you don't hear from us, then you run and you don't stop.
Would you care to tell me why you were running when all I want to do is talk to you?
You're very good at saying the perfect thing when life is easy, but when choices get hard, you run away.
What do you mean by running away from the man to whom I've promised you in marriage?
And then you run when things get important.
You're very good at saying the perfect thing when life is easy, but when choices get hard, you run away.
That woman needs her doctor to tell her something, anything, and you run away?
You spent all these months chasing me. Now I'm here and you start running?
They're holding out their hands out and you're running away.
